attributes.action: Intervene with the HMRC over the proposed reclassification vessels effecting Seafarers Earning Deductions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HMRC is planning in introducing new guidance over what is a ship, with regards to Seafarers Earning Deductions, effecting a large proportion of British Merchant Seafarers, even more diabolical is the proposed reclaiming retrospectively of monies issued, which will leave many Seafarers and their families in financial difficulty.
